translations: v．足够，满足（suffice的过去式和过去分词）
· A quick glance at the headlines sufficed to tell her the news.
快速浏览一下头条新闻就足以让她了解到这个消息。

sentences.sentence: This sufficed him for his living.
I looked forward to those precious weeks when one bag sufficed to meet my needs.
sentences.translation: 我期盼这这些珍贵的日子，在这些日子里一个包就能满足我的需求。

sentences.sentence: In this case, because you just wanted to open or close port 22960, a single command sufficed.
sentences.translation: 在这里，因为只希望打开或关闭端口22960，所以使用单一命令就够了。
